content:
#PVF_File

[TRIGGER]
    [LIMIT]
        1
    [WHICH]
    [ME]
    [CHECKUP]
        [HP]
        [<=]
            99999999
        [ POINT]
    [/CHECKUP]
    [ DO BEHAVIOR]
    [ME]
        0
[/TRIGGER]

[BEHAVIOR]
    [VIRTUALHP APPENDAGE]
        699 99999999    2   10
[/BEHAVIOR]

//理论就是当怪物血量小于或者等于99999999的时候触发连击条件 699次之后怪物破防
